enterKeyToActivate: Enter your license key to activate the software
requiredMessage: A valid license key is required to use this software
developerPermissions: Developer version includes code modification permissions
invalidKey: The license key you entered is invalid

syncGuide.title: Illustrated Sync Guide
syncGuide.description: This guide explains how to synchronize settings between developer device and remote client devices

developer.title: Developer Steps
developer.description: What the developer needs to do to share settings

step1.title: Switch to Developer Mode
step1.description: Click the toggle button at the top to switch to developer mode

step2.title: Make Desired Changes
step2.description: Make the required changes to settings and features in the developer control panel

step3.title: Open Sync Section and Generate Key
step3.description: Go to the 'Sync' tab and press the 'Upload Config' button to generate a sync key

step4.title: Share Key with Clients
step4.description: Share the sync key with clients via email or any other means

client.title: Client Steps
client.description: What the client needs to do to receive settings from the developer

step1.title: Ensure Client Mode
step1.description: Make sure the application is in client mode, not developer mode

step2.title: Click Sync Button
step2.description: Click the 'Sync' button in the top navigation bar

step3.title: Enter Sync Key
step3.description: Enter the sync key you received from the developer in the dialog that appears

step4.title: Download Configuration
step4.description: Click the 'Download Config' button to receive the latest settings

faq.title: Sync FAQs
faq.q1: Can the client sync from anywhere in the world?
faq.a1: Yes, the client can sync settings from anywhere as long as they have the correct sync key and internet connection.
faq.q2: Do all settings transfer to the client?
faq.a2: Yes, all settings and features configured by the developer are transferred to the client during synchronization.
faq.q3: What if I encounter a problem during synchronization?
faq.a3: Make sure you enter the sync key correctly and that you have an internet connection. If the problem persists, contact the developer for a new key.
faq.a4: Sync whenever the developer tells you there are new updates and improved settings. Synchronization is not automatic and requires your intervention.
